name: basecamp-emails-extension
description: Browser extension to search email addresses of Basecamp team users

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.prepare-release: npm run version:patch && npm run build && mkdir -p releases && cd dist && zip -r ../releases/basecamp-email-extension-v$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip . && cd .. && echo "✅ Release package created: releases/basecamp-email-extension-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip"
scripts.package:store: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../basecamp-email-extension.zip . && cd .. && echo "✅ Extension package ready for Chrome Web Store: basecamp-email-extension.zip"

author: Antistatique
